meanings.definition: A monumental tower, usually ornate, at the entrance of a Hindu temple.
meanings.sent1: The gopura stood tall at the entrance of the temple.
meanings.sent2: Visitors marveled at the intricate design of the gopura.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkeys climbed the gopura and played hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The gopura reached towards the sky like a giant staircase to the heavens.
meanings.sent5: The gopura gleamed in the sunlight, a beacon of divine beauty.

meanings.definition: The entrance gate of a Hindu temple, often with a pyramidal tower.
meanings.sent1: People gathered at the gopura to offer their prayers.
meanings.sent2: The priest welcomed the devotees at the gopura with a smile.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the gopura was a magical castle guarding the temple.
meanings.sent4: The gopura loomed over the temple grounds like a silent guardian.
meanings.sent5: The intricate carvings on the gopura told stories of ancient gods and heroes.
